snippet.title: Moonlight Pulse - Steam Next Fest 2023 Demo
snippet.description:
Team up, learn new abilities and explore a surreal world in this seamless 2D adventure within a colossal space creature. Traverse flowing veins, pulsating surfaces, and gastric hazards as the world itself breathes around you. And protect your home against a swarm of otherworldly parasites that threaten to consume all they see.

Featuring tight controls, wonderous environments and an engaging soundtrack, Moonlight Pulse is a memorable, well-paced adventure that promises to be engaging and satisfying from beginning to end.

Moonlight Pulse (C) Seafloor Games LLC
Coming to Steam in 2024
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2243250/Moonlight_Pulse/

#moonlightpulse #steam #steamnextfest #steamgame #steamgames
